attributes.action: schools to extend the remote learning with teachers online daily for at least 4h
attributes.background: Put pressure on schools to extend the remote learning with children online to cover more topics so that the children can learn more, in doing so ensures better education. On my daughter last remote learning children only had two hours with the teachers which only covers English and mathematics.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that primary schools, secondary schools and colleges across England must move to remote provision from 5 January 2021, but deciding how to deliver remote teaching is a matter for individual schools, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

Fund improved online education by schools and colleges due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563573
